pr_title: HHH-13874 - Deprecating methods that will be removed soon

timeline.message:
HHH-13874 - Deprecating methods that will be removed soon

Two methods that are dropped in v6.0 are now marked as deprecated in this commit.

As discussed in the removal PR https://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm/pull/3229

timeline.bodyText: You'll have to add a deprecation message
timeline.author: sebersole

replies.bodyText: Otherwise the build will fail with checkstyle failures
replies.author: sebersole

replies.bodyText:
Ah, my bad. I've added the deprecation messages.
Thanks for the correction.
replies.author: thegeekyasian

timeline.message: HHH-13874 - Messages added for the deprecated methods.

timeline.bodyText: technically speaking, you were not the original author of the method, were you?
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu

replies.bodyText:
No, I wasn’t.
I assumed that’s the deprecation template where one has to add their names while adding a message.
Should I remove that?
replies.author: thegeekyasian

replies.bodyText: Javadoc @author should only be reserved for the original author of the method IMO.
replies.author: NathanQingyangXu

replies.bodyText:
I agree with you on that.
I'll add a new commit that drops the @author added.
replies.author: thegeekyasian
